nodes.text: In 7942 C.R.C., a holo-star was captured and interrogated by the Coruscant Security Force while addled by spice. In exchange for the star's name being kept out of the headlines, the captive provided information that led the Security Force to a spice den run by Tach Drud on Level 3321 of the ecumenopolis that covered the planet Coruscant. Security Force Inspector Tanivos Divo wrote about the incident in his case files, which were later published by his grandson Exantor Divo.
The holo-star was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
